          "parent_id": "06ea8889-56ba-4359-a599-bf64fe77bac9",
          "parent_table": "block",
          "properties": {
            "title": [
              [
                "If the code expects a specific C++ standard, specify which standard to use by including the "
              ],
              [
                "-std=",
                [
                  ["c"],
                  [
                    "a",
                    "https://gcc.gnu.org/onlinedocs/gcc/C-Dialect-Options.html#index-std-112"
                  ]
                ]
              ],
              [
                " flag. Supported values correspond to the year of finalization for each version of the ISO C++ standard. As of GCC 6.1.0, valid values for the "
              ],
              ["std=", [["c"]]],
              [" flag are "],
              ["c++98", [["c"]]],
              ["/"],
              ["c++03", [["c"]]],
              [", "],
              ["c++11", [["c"]]],
              [", "],
              ["c++14", [["c"]]],
              [", and "],
              ["c++17", [["c"]]],
              ["/"],
              ["c++1z", [["c"]]],
              [". Values separated by a forward slash are equivalent."]
            ]
          },
          "space_id": "cf9fa7dd-b245-42a0-b929-d5a276b3afe0",
          "type": "text",
          "version": 1
        }
      },

                "-Wall",

                  ["c"],
                  [
                    "a",

                  ]
                ]
              ],
              [
                " flag enables warnings for many common errors and should always be used. To improve code quality it is often encouraged also to use "
              ],
              [
                "-Wextra",

                  [
                    "a",
                    "https://gcc.gnu.org/onlinedocs/gcc/Warning-Options.html#index-Wextra-310"

                ]
              ],
              [
                " and other warning flags which are not automatically enabled by "
              ],
              ["-Wall", [["c"]]],
              [" and "],
              ["-Wextra", [["c"]]],
              ["."]

          "parent_table": "block",
          "properties": {
            "title": [
              ["Note that due to bugs in GCC, the "],
              ["-pthread", [["c"]]],
              [
                " flag must be present at compilation and linking for GCC to support the C++ standard threading functionality introduced with C++11, such as "
              ],
              ["std::thread", [["c"]]],
              [" and "],
              ["std::wait_for", [["c"]]],
              [". Omitting it when using threading functions may result in "],
              [
                "no warnings but invalid results",
                [["a", "https://gcc.gnu.org/bugzilla/show_bug.cgi?id=58929"]]
              ],
              [" on some platforms."]
            ]
          },
          "space_id": "cf9fa7dd-b245-42a0-b929-d5a276b3afe0",
          "type": "text",
          "version": 5
        }
      },
